entry.summary: RTâ€‚the luke ðŸ³ï¸â€ðŸŒˆ There's no limit to the size you can upload to @ArweaveTeam with @BundlrNetwork. We offer optional event callbacks you can use to get updated each time a new file "chunk" is uploaded, here I use the callback data to build a progress bar. Seconds later 90MB are on the permaweb.
